name: dse
description: Datastax Enterpise Cassandra running on Apache Mesos
preInstallNotes: The DSE DCOS Service implementation is alpha and there may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation or other discrepancies.
postInstallNotes:
Thank you for installing the DSE DCOS Service.

	Documentation: https://github.com/elodina/datastax-enterprise-mesos/blob/master/README.md 
	Issues: https://github.com/elodina/datastax-enterprise-mesos/issues
postUninstallNotes: The DSE DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
